title: Graphic Designer / Video Editor (Part-Time)
job_overview:
???? HIRING: Graphic Designer / Video Editor (Part-Time, Remote, Philippines)
???? 20 hours per week | Long-term | Work-from-home

We’re a busy Australian digital marketing agency. We need a creative specialist to help us produce stunning visuals for our clients.

? What you’ll do:

Design social posts, stories, carousels, ads & banners

Edit short videos for reels, TikToks & Facebook ads

Create brand kits, logos, flyers & print-ready materials

Follow brand guidelines & keep all content consistent

Turn simple briefs into high-quality creative fast

???? Who we’re looking for:

Great eye for design, modern clean style

Confident with Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator (or similar)

Experience with CapCut / Premiere / After Effects for short-form edits

Fast turnaround — can produce multiple pieces a day

Portfolio that shows your range (not just templated posts)

???? Perks:

Long-term role (20 hrs/week) with stable pay

Work with a variety of brands & industries — always interesting

Room to grow into a creative lead role

???? To apply:
Send us:

Your best design portfolio & video samples

A quick intro video (30 sec is fine)

Your expected monthly rate for 20 hours/week
